law.text: The purpose of this subtitle is to establish minimum financial standards for workersâ€™ compensation self-insured groups to ensure that self-insured groups are providing adequate coverage for member employersâ€™ risks and liabilities under KRS Chapter 342 for injured employees of the member employers.
law.history: Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 1, effective March 1, 2005.
